item.title: About
item.description: about me I am a PhD student in the Earth Systems Science department at the Stanford Doerr School of Sustainability studying our changing environment. I am part of the EchoLab advised by Marshall Burke. In the past, I was a pre-doctoral fellow at the Energy Policy Institute (EPIC) at the University of Chicago, working at the Climate Impact Lab. In a previous life, I was a Data Scientist at DSaPP (now at CMU), and a career bureaucrat at the Central Bank of Colombia.
